name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (IzzyGames)
description:
Solve simple anagrams and hack into a police station, NASA and more! A simple game for you to play. Challenge your friends and see who can hack into NASA the fastest!!!

Find out all 3 win screens!  

Easter egg: Type in 69 in the menu :-)

I made this game with the Unity3D course on udemy. Check it out here.
